titles.title: Expressing congratulations to the towns of Camden, Bethune, Elgin, and Kershaw County, South Carolina, for being named 1 of 10 All-American Cities winners.
Expressing congratulations to the towns of Camden, Bethune, Elgin, and Kershaw County, South Carolina, for being named 1 of 10 All-American Cities winners.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Recognizes Kershaw County, South Carolina, and its towns for having won a prestigious award.
Commends the work accomplished by its citizens to create a better community for all South Carolinians.
